mosinstall.name: perForms Module
mosinstall.author: Developaid Dave - (Original: GWS - Revised by Digital Access, USA)
mosinstall.description: Extract and display data from perForms.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: legend
param.label: Legend
param.description: An additional header can be displayed: in Summary View is top of table header, in Report View is the legend.

param.name: show_sql
param.label: Show the sql query in the results?
param.description: If 'Yes' then the query will appear on the page.

param.name: sql_query
param.label: SQL Query
param.description: The SQL Query to use. If this field is used, the fields below will be ignored.

param.name: form_id
param.label: Form ID
param.description:
ID of the form to display.
If you use this field, you should not use the "SQL Query" field. Please check the fields below.

param.name: argument
param.label: Arguments for the Sql WHERE clause
param.description:
Enter your argument used in the where clause. Some arguments need to be enclosed in ' ' .
Don't type WHERE, the perForms module will insert that automatically.

param.name: hdrone
param.label: Limit number of rows to display
param.description: Enter a number to display that number of rows IE 10 or 25 etc.

param.name: hdrtwo
param.label: Sort by Field name
param.description: Enter the name of the field that you wish to sort by IE: if you wish to sort by users enter 'users'. Note must be enclosed by ' '
